name: unintuitively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is difficult to use or learn without special knowledge: At first many people found it hard to navigate e-commerce sites as the goods for sale were presented unintuitively.
in a way that is different from what you would expect : Perhaps unintuitively, not trying too hard can sometimes lead to success. Compare
intuitively
More examplesFewer examplesI found the photo and video app worked unintuitively.The puzzles are simple but presented unintuitively.This choice is unintuitively located under the dropdown options.
